## Define a function to write text in typewriter font
tt <- function(x) {
  if (knitr::is_latex_output()) {
    sprintf("\\texttt{%s}", as.character(x))
  } else if (knitr::is_html_output()) {
    sprintf("<tt>%s</tt>", as.character(x))
  } else {
    x
  }
}

## Retrieve Data from `r tt("AoC")`


```{r get-data, cache = FALSE, messages = FALSE}
session_cookie <- set_cookies(session = keyring::key_get("AoC-GitHub-Cookie"))
base_url <- paste0("https://adventofcode.com/", params$year, "/day/", params$task_nr)
puzzle <- GET(base_url,
              session_cookie) %>% 
  content(encoding = "UTF-8") %>% 
  xml_find_all("///article") %>% 
  lapply(as.character)

parse_puzzle_data <- function(text_block = readClipboard()) {
  if (length(text_block) == 1L) {
    text_block <- text_block %>% 
      str_split("\n") %>% 
      extract2(1L) %>% 
      keep(nzchar)
  }
  text_block %>% 
    str_split("") %>% 
    do.call(c, .) %>% 
    as.integer()
}

puzzle_data <- local({
  GET(paste0(base_url, "/input"),
      session_cookie) %>% 
    content(encoding = "UTF-8") %>% 
    parse_puzzle_data()
})
```

# Puzzle Day `r params$task_nr`

## Part 1

### Description

```{r show-puzzle-a, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
cat(puzzle[[1]])
```

### Solution

We create an 3 dimensional `array`. We jsut have to transpose dimensions 1 and 2 first,
as `R` expects its input in column order.

```{r get-solution-1}
create_layers <- function(pixels = puzzle_data) {
  n <- length(pixels)
  dims <- c(25L, 6L, n / (25L * 6L))
  layers <- array(pixels, dims) %>% 
    aperm(c(2L, 1L, 3L))
}

checksum <- function(layers) {
  n_zeros <- apply(layers, 3L, \(x) sum(x == 0))
  idx <- which.min(n_zeros)
  
  sum(layers[, , idx] == 1L) * sum(layers[, , idx] == 2L)
}

layers <- create_layers(puzzle_data)
checksum(layers)

```

## Part 2

### Description

```{r show-puzzle-b, echo = FALSE, results = "asis", eval = length(puzzle) > 1}
cat(puzzle[[2]])
```

### Solution

We decode the picture as indicated and get teh secret message which reads `GCPHL`.

```{r get-solution-2, comment = ""}
print.pic <- function(x, ...) {
  pic <- matrix(" ", nrow(x), ncol(x))
  pic[x == 1] <- "\U2588"
  apply(pic, 1, paste, collapse = "") %>% 
    paste(collapse = "\n") %>% 
    cat("\n")
  invisible(x)
}

decode_image <- function(layers) {
  pic <- layers[, , 1L]
  pic[] <- NA_integer_
  for (i in seq_len(dim(layers)[3L])) {
    layer <- layers[, , i]
    layer[layer == 2L] <- NA_integer_
    idx <- is.na(pic)
    pic[idx] <- layer[idx]
  }
  class(pic) <- "pic"
  pic
}

decode_image(layers) %>% 
  print()
```
